attributes.action: To protect all front line public services(Police, Ambulance/NHS, fire) from cuts
attributes.additional_details:
The government seem to be determined to decimate the very heart of public service that has made Britain great. They are imposing cuts and/or changes that are impossible to achieve without increased funding or the correct research from professional's that work at the heart of our public services. The great services are fundamental to protect British life, culture and its communities.

The public must ACT to prevent the loss of our services that protect us from Crime, Terrorism,illness, fire
attributes.background: The government are reforming, reducing budgets and implementing impossible working practices. This petition is to protect all front line services from cuts including Police Service, NHS and Ambulance service, Fire service.
